channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [PDFBOX-4824] NullpointerException with PDFDebugger
item.description:
the attached PDF is showing an exception when opened on PDFDebugger:

 

java.lang.RuntimeException: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NullPointerException
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.debugger.pagepane.PagePane$RenderWorker.done(PagePane.java:434)}}
{{ sun.swing.AccumulativeRunnable.run(AccumulativeRunnable.java:112)}}
{{ java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)}}
{{ java.security.ProtectionDomain$JavaSecurityAccessImpl.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:80)}}
Caused by: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NullPointerException
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.debugger.pagepane.PagePane$RenderWorker.done(PagePane.java:414)}}
{{ sun.swing.AccumulativeRunnable.run(AccumulativeRunnable.java:112)}}
{{ java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)}}
{{ java.security.ProtectionDomain$JavaSecurityAccessImpl.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:80)}}
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: null
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDCIDFontType2.codeToGID(PDCIDFontType2.java:267)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDType0Font.codeToGID(PDType0Font.java:547)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.TTFGlyph2D.getGIDForCharacterCode(TTFGlyph2D.java:101)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.TTFGlyph2D.getPathForCharacterCode(TTFGlyph2D.java:92)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PageDrawer.drawGlyph2D(PageDrawer.java:468)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PageDrawer.showFontGlyph(PageDrawer.java:449)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine.showGlyph(PDFStreamEngine.java:785)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine.showText(PDFStreamEngine.java:741)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine.showTextString(PDFStreamEngine.java:601)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.operator.text.ShowText.process(ShowText.java:56)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine.processOperator(PDFStreamEngine.java:875)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine.processStreamOperators(PDFStreamEngine.java:509)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine.processStream(PDFStreamEngine.java:483)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine.processPage(PDFStreamEngine.java:156)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PageDrawer.drawPage(PageDrawer.java:270)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PDFRenderer.renderImage(PDFRenderer.java:321)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.debugger.pagepane.PagePane$RenderWorker.doInBackground(PagePane.java:402)}}
{{ org.apache.pdfbox.debugger.pagepane.PagePane$RenderWorker.doInBackground(PagePane.java:384)}}
{{ java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)}}

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I don't get an NPE. Are there other log messages before? I get

 Warning  [PDCIDFontType2] Using fallback font Batang for CID-keyed TrueType font ¹ÙÅÁ,Italic
 Warning  [PDCIDFontType2] Using fallback font Batang for CID-keyed TrueType font ¹ÙÅÁ

I don't see warnings (launching from command line with java -jar debugger-app-2.0.19.jar).

I'm on a Mac with Catalina 10.15.

Java 1.8.0_121-b13
Are there any log messages in the log window? To see these, click on the status line on the right if it has a text like "2 warnings".

After closing the Exception window i see 1 warning:

 

Warning [PDCIDFontType2] Using fallback font null for CID-keyed TrueType font ¹ÙÅÁ,Italic

Also, just updated to Java 1.8.0_252.
Page 5 opens correctly. Other pages have same exception.
OK, this will be a tricky one. So PDFBox chooses a font with no name... I'll put out more logging so that we get to know what fallback font you're using.

Commit 1877529 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/branches/2.0'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877529 ]

PDFBOX-4824: log fonts to find actual used file name (will be set to debug later)

Something is currently broken with our build process. What could be done instead:

  • nothing, just wait until it works again (I'll post the link)
  • you build locally
  • I build locally and upload to sharehoster
  • debugging yourself at the place I inserted the log messages. I want to know the path that is in bestMatch.info in FontMapperImpl.

Build server works again. Get a snapshot here (at the bottom) and try again, and post the log outputs, please

https://repository.apache.org/content/groups/snapshots/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfbox-debugger/2.0.20-SNAPSHOT/

I followed the debugging path. This is bestMatch.info, right before crash:

AppleSDGothicNeo-Medium (OTF, mac: 0x0, os/2: 0x0, cid: Adobe-Korea1-0) /System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc

Commit 1877545 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/branches/2.0'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877545 ]

PDFBOX-4824: more temporary logging

Please try with the latest from

https://repository.apache.org/content/groups/snapshots/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfbox-debugger/2.0.20-SNAPSHOT/

and post the log messages. After that, end PDFDebugger, delete the file ".pdfbox.cache" in your user directory, and then try again and post the log messages and tell whether the exception still happens.

If possible, please upload your font file.

It crashes before and after the cache removal with the following message:

{{bestMatch for '¹ÙÅÁ,Italic': AppleSDGothicNeo-Medium (OTF, mac: 0x0, os/2: 0x0, cid: Adobe-Korea1-0) /System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc}}
bestMatch2: (null)
bestMatch3: null

The FontProvider log is not skipping the {{AppleSDGothicNeo }}font. Actually I just saw a crash when calling 
ttf.getUnicodeCmapLookup(false)
on font /System/Library/Fonts/LastResort.otf:

java.io.IOException: Invalid Characters codesjava.io.IOException: Invalid Characters codes at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.CmapSubtable.processSubtype13(CmapSubtable.java:318) at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.CmapSubtable.initSubtable(CmapSubtable.java:114) at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.CmapTable.read(CmapTable.java:86) at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.TrueTypeFont.readTable(TrueTypeFont.java:353) at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.TrueTypeFont.getTable(TrueTypeFont.java:142) at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.TrueTypeFont.getCmap(TrueTypeFont.java:254) at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.TrueTypeFont.getUnicodeCmapImpl(TrueTypeFont.java:548) at org.apache.fontbox.ttf.TrueTypeFont.getUnicodeCmapLookup(TrueTypeFont.java:533) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FileSystemFontProvider.addTrueTypeFontImpl(FileSystemFontProvider.java:665) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FileSystemFontProvider.addTrueTypeFont(FileSystemFontProvider.java:625) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FileSystemFontProvider.scanFonts(FileSystemFontProvider.java:347) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FileSystemFontProvider.<init>(FileSystemFontProvider.java:326) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl$DefaultFontProvider.<clinit>(FontMapperImpl.java:128) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl.getProvider(FontMapperImpl.java:147) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl.findFont(FontMapperImpl.java:411) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl.findFontBoxFont(FontMapperImpl.java:374) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl.getFontBoxFont(FontMapperImpl.java:348) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDType1Font.<init>(PDType1Font.java:146) at org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDType1Font.<clinit>(PDType1Font.java:79) at org.apache.pdfbox.debugger.PDFDebugger.main(PDFDebugger.java:1257)
Two fonts attached

Was there a log output indicating that the cache was being rebuilt?

If no: it should be...

If yes: please open the cache file and post the line containing that problematic apple gothic neo font.

cache was rebuilt:

{{}}
AppleSDGothicNeo-Regular|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|190|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc
.AppleSDGothicNeoI-Regular|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|190|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc

AppleSDGothicNeo-Light|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|12c|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc
.AppleSDGothicNeoI-Light|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|12c|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc

.AppleSDGothicNeoI-Thin|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|64|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc
AppleSDGothicNeo-UltraLight|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|c8|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc
.AppleSDGothicNeoI-UltraLight|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|c8|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc
AppleSDGothicNeo-ExtraBold|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|320|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc
.AppleSDGothicNeoI-ExtraBold|OTF|Adobe-Korea1-0|320|0|280005|0|0|02000300000000000000|/System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc

Thank you, I'm getting closer with the file. I suspect that the problem is related to this comment

// todo JH: we don't yet support loading CFF fonts from OTC collections

Commit 1877597 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/branches/2.0'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877597 ]

PDFBOX-4824: revert temporary logging

Commit 1877598 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/branches/2.0'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877598 ]

PDFBOX-4824: get OpenTypeFont from collection
Please try again. The cause was that OTF fonts in TrueType collections were not read properly. I'm surprised that this NPE hasn't happened earlier.

working now, thanks!

Log:

May 11, 2020 11:34:36 PM org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl getCIDFont
{{INFO: bestMatch for '¹ÙÅÁ,Italic': AppleSDGothicNeo-Medium (OTF, mac: 0x0, os/2: 0x0, cid: Adobe-Korea1-0) /System/Library/Fonts/AppleSDGothicNeo.ttc}}
May 11, 2020 11:34:36 PM org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl getCIDFont
INFO: bestMatch2: AppleSDGothicNeo-Medium
May 11, 2020 11:34:36 PM org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.FontMapperImpl getCIDFont
INFO: bestMatch3: org.apache.fontbox.ttf.CmapTable@1d6c7b45
May 11, 2020 11:34:36 PM org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDCIDFontType2 findFontOrSubstitute
{{WARNING: Using fallback font AppleSDGothicNeo-Medium for CID-keyed TrueType font ¹ÙÅÁ,Italic}}

Commit 1877618 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/branches/2.0'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877618 ]

PDFBOX-4824: set logs to debug only

Commit 1877623 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877623 ]

PDFBOX-4824: get OpenTypeFont from collection + add debug logging

Thank you, glad to hear that. Please retest with the current snapshot to be sure that it works and the debug log outputs are gone. There should be only two lines similar to those I mentioned initially.

Commit 1877628 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/branches/issue45'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877628 ]

PDFBOX-4824: get OpenTypeFont from collection + add debug logging
Yes, i confirm that I only see those logs. Thanks!

Commit 1877667 from Tilman Hausherr in branch 'pdfbox/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1877667 ]

PDFBOX-4824: remove unused imports

Thank you, also for your patience and cooperation. I've removed the fonts because I have a "bad feeling about this", want to avoid trouble with Apple, but I'm keeping them locally just in case. I haven't checked the lastresort font, the error message suggests that something is wrong with the font, which would not be surprising (the ArialUni font is an example). If you think there is a bug, I'd need some real failing real world application, e.g. creating a PDF with that font.
